1.0.1.en: Add github repo, resolve possible crash on settings error

1.0.2.en: Update slogan, fix unavailable fan issue

1.0.3.en: Rework fan to use modern Homey capabilities, fix token issues

1.0.4.en: Prevent app crash in certain scenario's

1.1.0.en: Add support for multiple new categories: CO2 detectors, humidifiers, dehumifiers, air conditioners, PM2.5 detectors, gas alarms and vibration sensors. Adds video streaming support for camera devices. Also adds power meter support to plug devices when available.

1.1.1.en: Add support for multiple new categories: CO2 detectors, humidifiers, dehumifiers, air conditioners, PM2.5 detectors, gas alarms and vibration sensors. Adds video streaming support for camera devices. Also adds power meter support to plug devices when available.

1.1.3.en: Improve error messages, fix reverse fan direction for certain fans
